description: John is a 23 year old ski and snowboard instructor who was visiting some friends on vacation when one of our scouts ran into him and asked him if he'd be interested in doing some modeling.He's a tall, good-looking guy who is very in-shape and takes care of his body. Luckily for us, John is all about taking off his clothes for the camera. And that is exactly what he did. He mentioned that he was in-between girlfriends at the moment, so he took us up on the offer to have a little fun by himself.Watch John in two scenes as he relaxes, turns himself on, and gets himself off. We know you'll enjoy this stud just as much as we did.
title: John
